languages.text: {n}Вирт что-то неразборчиво шепчет под нос, сдирая с обветренных щек мгновенно замерзающие слезы.{/n} "...сти... Прости меня, Альбрис..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Вирт что-то неразборчиво шепчет под нос, сдирая с обветренных щек мгновенно замерзающие слезы.{/n} "...сти... Прости меня, Альбрис..."

languages.text: {n}Vir mumbles something unintelligible, wiping the instantly freezing tears from his weathered cheeks.{/n} "—give...Forgive me, Albris..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vir mumbles something incoherently, prying the quickly drying tears away from his rugged cheeks.{/n} "...give...Forgive me, Albris..."

languages.text: {n}ヴィルは意味不明な何かをつぶやきながら、風化した頬をつたう凍りついた涙を拭い取る。{/n}「…許してくれ、アルブリス…」
languages.original_text: {n}Vir mumbles something unintelligible, wiping the instantly freezing tears from his weathered cheeks.{/n} "—give...Forgive me, Albris..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィルは意味不明な何かをつぶやきながら、風化した頬をつたう凍りついた涙を拭い取る。{/n}「…許してくれ、アルブリス…」

languages.text: {n}Vir murmure à voix basse en s'essuyant d'un revers de main les larmes qui gèlent instantanément sur son visage buriné :{/n} « ...rdon... Pardon, Albris... »
languages.original_text: {n}Vir mumbles something unintelligible, wiping the instantly freezing tears from his weathered cheeks.{/n} "—give...Forgive me, Albris..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vir murmure à voix basse en s'essuyant d'un revers de main les larmes qui gèlent instantanément sur son visage buriné :{/n} « ...rdon... Pardon, Albris... »

languages.text: {n}维尔以你听不到的声音喃喃自语着，擦拭着被冻坏的脸上瞬间凝固的泪水。{/n}“……不起……原谅我，阿布里斯……”
languages.original_text: {n}Vir mumbles something unintelligible, wiping the instantly freezing tears from his weathered cheeks.{/n} "—give...Forgive me, Albris..."

traits.locale_text: {n}维尔以你听不到的声音喃喃自语着，擦拭着被冻坏的脸上瞬间凝固的泪水。{/n}“……不起……原谅我，阿布里斯……”

languages.text: {n}Vir murmura algo ininteligible, secándose las lágrimas heladas de sus deterioradas mejillas.{/n} «... dóname... Perdóname, Albris...».
languages.original_text: {n}Vir mumbles something unintelligible, wiping the instantly freezing tears from his weathered cheeks.{/n} "—give...Forgive me, Albris..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vir murmura algo ininteligible, secándose las lágrimas heladas de sus deterioradas mejillas.{/n} «... dóname... Perdóname, Albris...».

languages.text: {n}Vir murmelt etwas Unverständliches und wischt sich die sofort frierenden Tränen von den gegerbten Wangen.{/n} "-gebt ... vergebt mir, Albris ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Vir mumbles something unintelligible, wiping the instantly freezing tears from his weathered cheeks.{/n} "—give...Forgive me, Albris..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vir murmelt etwas Unverständliches und wischt sich die sofort frierenden Tränen von den gegerbten Wangen.{/n} "-gebt ... vergebt mir, Albris ..."

languages.text: {n}Anlaşılmaz bir şeyler geveleyen Vir, kırmızı yanaklarına döküldüğü anda donan gözyaşlarını siliyor.{/n} "Af... Affet beni Albris..."
